automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: Our automated systems collect user reputation and violation reports for analysis purposes.

transparency_statement.label: transparency_statement
transparency_statement.text: The automated system relies on criteria including authenticity signals and relevance scores.

transparency_statement.label: transparency_statement
transparency_statement.text: The automated system relies on criteria including previous behavior patterns and click-through rates.

transparency_statement.label: transparency_statement
transparency_statement.text: We are committed to transparency regarding our use of safety considerations and relevance scores in automated systems.

transparency_statement.label: transparency_statement
transparency_statement.text: We are committed to transparency regarding our use of violation reports and geographic signals in automated systems.

transparency_statement.label: transparency_statement
transparency_statement.text: Our governance framework addresses algorithmic processing of click-through rates, device information, and account age.
